class rest.core.views.SnippetFreshnessView(**kwargs)[source]¶

A view that returns status of staleness of data in JSON. statleness of data would be measured on some logic provided by the business people.

class rest.core.views.SnippetList(**kwargs)[source]¶

API Endpoint that allows Snippet to be viewed.

serializer_class¶

alias of SnippetSerializer

class rest.core.views.UpdateUserName(**kwargs)[source]¶
This class handles the update functionality for updating the username of a user. We pass the new username as part of header. command to run from command prompt:

curl -X PUT -H “Content-Type: application/json” -d ‘{“username”: “Vikas”}’ http://127.0.0.1:8080/user/update/3

serializer_class¶

alias of UserSerializer

rest.core.views.days_between(d1, d2)[source]¶

Accepts two dates as arguments and return the difference of days between them.

rest.core.views.get_auth_token(request)[source]¶

Returns the token assigned to a particular user instance, by passing the username and password as part of the headers.
